item.Q:
Write the character:
from; self; oneself; since
item.A:
zì
自己 zìjǐ self; (reflexive pronoun); own

item.Q:
Write the character:
and; as well as; but (not); yet (not); (shows causal relation); (shows change of state); (shows contrast)
item.A:
ér
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: 11 p.m.-1 a.m.; 1st earthly branch; child; midnight; son; child; seed; egg; small thing
2: (noun suff.)
item.A:
1: zǐ 2: zi
分子 fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction 种子 (種子) zhǒngzi seed

item.Q:
Write the character:
back; behind; rear; afterwards; after; later
item.A:
traditional: 後
hòu
以后 (以後) yǐhòu after; later; afterwards; following; later on; in the future

item.Q:

to question; to ask; to interrogate; rapid; speedy; fast; news; information
item.A:
讯 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 訊
xùn

jīa
国家 (國家) guójīa country; nation

item.A:

zhǐ

to go; to leave; to remove; fourth tone of putonghua
item.A:
qù

zhī

guó

item.A: hěn

tái
台湾 (台灣) Táiwān Taiwan

item.A:
chéng

xìn

tóng
